response_parsed.title: Packaging Edge Runtimes Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a step-by-step explanation on how to package edge runtimes using FastAPI with Python 3.12+, focusing on best practices and key features.
key_points: Understanding the requirements for packaging edge runtimes
Setting up a FastAPI project with Python 3.12+
Creating Dockerfile(s) for building and deploying the application
Testing and optimizing the packaged edge runtime

code_examples.code:
from fastapi import FastAPI
app = FastAPI()

# Define your routes, models, and dependencies here.

FROM python:3.12

# Install required packages
RUN pip install fastapi uvicorn

# Copy the application code
COPY app /app

# Set working directory and run the application
WORKDIR /app
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is recommended for this guide due to the inclusion of new features and improvements.
FastAPI version 0.65.x or later is suggested, as it offers better support for asynchronous requests and deployment options.
caveats: Ensure that all dependencies are properly listed in the requirements.txt file
